self = authenticated_api = @allure.story("Add → Edit → Delete car in garage") @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.CRITICAL) def test_add_edit_delete_car(self, authenticated_api: ApiFacade): with allure.step("Добавить машину в гараж (POST /business/add-car-to-garage/)"): add_payload = { "brand": 69, "model": 641, "year": 2023, "mileage": 0.0, "plate_number": "10G995YY", "is_manually_entered": True, "changed_part": [] } add_resp = authenticated_api.business.add_car_to_garage(add_payload) allure.attach(add_resp.text, name="Add Car Response", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.JSON) > assert add_resp.status_code == 201, f"Add car failed: {add_resp.text}" E AssertionError: Add car failed: E E E E Not Found E E E
